document.full_text: at dawn on tuesday, re-enactors dressed and armed as confederate soldiers will fire cannons toward fort sumter, commemorating the first shots of the civil war 150 years ago.
document.title: solemn tribute to mark 150 years since civil war's start
lines_and_colors: at dawn on tuesday, re-enactors dressed and armed as confederate soldiers will fire cannons toward fort sumter, commemorating the first shots of the civil war 150 years ago.
